abstract: Mexico's National Human Rights Commission opens probe into killing of 42 people, said to be gang members, in confrontation with federal police.
lead_paragraph: The National Human Rights Commission has opened an investigation into the killing of 42 people last week in a confrontation with the federal police.

headline.main: Mexico: Michoacán Killings Prompt Human Rights Inquiry
headline.print_headline: The Americas; Mexico: Michoacán Killings Prompt Human Rights Inquiry

snippet: The National Human Rights Commission has opened an investigation into the killing of 42 people last week in a confrontation with the federal police.
